Smart Key Managementfor VNR College

Streamline laboratory access with our QR-based key management system. Secure, efficient, and designed for educational institutions.

Key Management

Efficiently manage and track all laboratory keys with QR code technology.

Security Control

Secure access control with role-based permissions and real-time monitoring.

User Management

Manage faculty, security personnel, and administrative users seamlessly.

Analytics & Reports

Comprehensive analytics and reporting for key usage and security insights.

Role-Based Access Control

Faculty

View assigned keys, generate QR codes, and share access with colleagues.

Security

Monitor key status, handle handovers, and track key movements.

Admin

Full system control, analytics, user management, and reporting.
